com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.client

Class ClientGroupNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.AGroupNetwork
      • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.client.ClientGroupNetwork

  • public class ClientGroupNetwork
extends AGroupNetwork
    AGroupNetwork implementation, which tries to join existing group network, where user becomes "client."

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.AGroupNetwork

      ClientGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String groupPassword, java.lang.String serverAddress, int port)
      Prepares new GroupClientThread bound on interface of given hostAddress with given password and server address.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientGroupNetwork

        public ClientGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String groupPassword,
                          java.lang.String serverAddress,
                          int port)
                   throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Prepares new GroupClientThread bound on interface of given hostAddress with given password and server address.
        Parameters:
        userName - User's name in network
        groupPassword - Password required to access this group or null, if none
        serverAddress - Address of group owner
        port - Port of server socket
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
